original: Nasaraṇaṁ noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: na saraṇam noāsavam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca
na saraṇam na no āsavam dhammam paṭicca
na saraṇam na sa āsavam dhammam paṭicca

original: Nasaraṇaṁ naanāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: na saraṇam na anāsavam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca

original: Nasaraṇaṁ naāsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na saraṇam na āsava sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe ekam pe avigate tīṇi
na saraṇam na āsava vippayuttam dhammam paṭicca

original: Nasaraṇaṁ naāsavañceva naanāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: na saraṇam na āsavañca iva na anāsavañca dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca

original: Nasaraṇaṁ naanāsavañceva nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na saraṇam na anāsavam ca iva na no ca āsavam dhammam paṭicca

original: Nasaraṇaṁ naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṁ naāsavavippayuttañceva nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na saraṇam na āsavam ca iva na āsava vippayuttam ca dhammam paṭicca pe na saraṇam na āsava vippayuttam ca iva na no ca āsavam dhammam paṭicca
na saraṇam na āsava vippayuttam na sa āsavam dhammam paṭicca

original: Nasaraṇaṁ naāsavavippayuttaṁ naanāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na saraṇam na āsava vippayuttam na anāsavam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe ekam pe avigate tīṇi
